sentences.en: A foray to your supermarket will supply all the ready-made foods for an excellent picnic.
sentences.cn: 去一趟超市就可以将一次完美野餐所需的现成食物置办妥当。
一演员对政治的尝试性介入.

sentences.en: And that does raise questions about Fiat's latest foray in China.
sentences.cn: 这确实给菲亚特最新进军中国之举是否明智打上了问号.

sentences.en: Disney's foray into English - language instruction in China comes as the niche industry is booming.
sentences.cn: 迪士尼涉足中国英语教学市场正赶上这一市场蓬勃兴旺之际.

sentences.en: Emporio Armani, the Italian fashion house, has made a discreet foray into furnishings.
sentences.cn: 意大利时装品牌安普里奥·阿玛尼谨慎进入家居用品市场。
他可能会夺占我们的田地.

sentences.en: Her foray into film began with a long collaboration with English art house director Derek Jarman.
sentences.cn: 她涉足电影界始于与英格兰艺术电影导演德里克·贾曼的长期合作.

sentences.en: Most guests make at least one foray into the town.
sentences.cn: 多数客人至少去过一次城里。

sentences.en: the company's first foray into the computer market
sentences.cn: 该公司的初次涉足计算机市场

sentences.en: The genesis of the nanobattery springs from an earlier Bell Labs foray into nanotechnology.
sentences.cn: 奈米电池的开发缘起于贝尔实验室先前进军奈米科技的行动.

sentences.en: The officer sent a few of his men on a foray.
sentences.cn: 军官送了一些他的人去突袭.

sentences.en: These base camps were used by the PKK guerrillas to make forays into Turkey.
sentences.cn: 这些基地营被库尔德工人党游击队用来对土耳其进行突袭。

sentences.en: This foray is just one part of Alibaba's increasingly aggressive push for global expansion.
sentences.cn: 此番初次尝试,只是阿里巴巴势头日增的全球扩张行动的一部分.

sentences.en: Upon returning to England, he employed the favorable media attention as foray into politics.
sentences.cn: 一回到英国, 他就利用媒体的高知名度,作为进入政坛的踏板.

sentences.en: Wright is about to make his first foray into the music business.
